title: Chart Titles
description: In this program, you will customize the box plot so that the title, subtitle, x-axis label, and y-axis label are more meaningful than the default. Begin by running the program and looking at the default titles. Then stop the program and changes each title before running the program again.
hint: Drag each of the blocks in the tray and place them after the chart is generated but before the chart is displayed. Then make any changes to the titles or choose to keep the default titles. Then run the program.
